name: Bomb on Basic City: Special Edition
description:
Bomb on Basic City: Special Edition is a physical special edition release of the updated 2018 version of the homebrew Genesis game Bomb on Basic City originally released in 2016. This entry covers the physical cartridge release of the game as there was also a ROM download release called Bomb on Basic City (Special Edition) where the differences between the 2016 and the 2018 version of the game are described in full.

This release contains:
  • Bomb on Basic City (2018 version on a cartridge)
  • Papy Commando Tennis (demo version, on the same cartridge)
  • Cardboard sleeve for the packaging
  • PVC case with a colour cover
  • Full colour manual in English and French (40 pages)
  • Full colour making-of square fold in English and French (44 pages)
  • 10 bonus cards with cheat codes
